channel.title: Training Sessions at Summit 2020 on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Training Sessions at Summit 2020 on Open Security Summit

item.title: Introduction to Team Topologies
item.description: Why No prior understanding is required of the Team Topologies methodologies for team structure. This session will be introduction to the methodologies and key considerations

item.title: Threat Model (over breakfast)
item.description: Why In order to participate in the discussions a basic understanding of threat modeling is needed. This 30 minute training will give you just enough knowledge to follow and participate in the threat model track as well as teach you how to navigate the OWASP project and other practical information.

item.title: Threat Model introduction
item.description: Why In order to participate in the discussions a basic understanding of threat modeling is needed. This 30 minute training will give you just enough knowledge to follow and participate in the threat model track as well as teach you how to navigate the OWASP project and other practical information.
